docs.snippet: Researchers said at least one million people would die worldwide if the Trump administration’s proposed funding cuts to public health programs were enacted.

headline.print_headline: Cuts to AIDS Programs  May Cost a Million Lives
headline.main: Cuts to AIDS Treatment Programs Could Cost a Million Lives

docs.snippet: Montepulciano d’Abruzzo doesn’t have the star power of many other Italian wines and regions, but it has enough going for it to warrant a second look.

docs.snippet: Far from being stuffy, a longer, looser dress in breathable cotton or linen is effortlessly cool.

docs.snippet: Parties and politicians took a tougher stance ahead voting on Sunday, from Lampedusa in the south to Lake Como, where the Swiss border beckons migrants.

docs.snippet: La Meute started a year and a half ago in Quebec to oppose what it calls “invasive political Islam.” Now, its social media campaign has more than 50,000 followers.

docs.snippet: Dayanita Singh has spent the past decade creating customizable photo books that are a portable exhibit and catalog in one.
